downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 White Paper: Overview of Enterprise Portal
downloadDescription: This document describes the modules, features, and business tasks users perform in Enterprise Portal.

downloadFile.name: Overview of Enterprise Portal in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.xps
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/3/a/9/3a9e6780-a206-4b31-89dc-f4d8f6b85bd3/Overview of Enterprise Portal in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.xps

detailsSection: Microsoft Dynamics AX provides a set of Web modules that give you access to Microsoft Dynamics AX data and allow you to participate in business processes using Web-based Microsoft Dynamics AX forms. These modules and the portal system are collectively called Enterprise Portal. Enterprise Portal is built on Microsoft® Windows® SharePoint® Services or Microsoft Office® SharePoint Server. This document provides an overview of the features of Enterprise Portal.
detailsSection_file_name: Overview of Enterprise Portal in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.pdf
Overview of Enterprise Portal in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.xps
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
